page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENTS:BOYS GAME
page.content: {THE GAME OF ROTTEN EGG:}FIRST SOMEONE IS ON.THEN THE PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT GATHER ROUND.THE PERSON WHO IS ON CALLS A SUBJECT.PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT ON SAY TO EACH OTHER THINGS, " LIKE YOU ARE A CAVILIER," AND "YOU ARE AN ESCORT,".THEN YOU ALL TURN ROUND AND ONE OF THE PEOPLE WHO ARE NOT ON SAYS ALL THE NAMES OF THE CARS.THEN THE PERSON WHO IS ON SAYS ONE OF THE CARS NAMES.IF HE SAYS, "ESCORT," HE WOULD SAY IT AND THROW A BALL BEHIND HIS BACK.THE PERSON WHO IS " ESCORT " HAS TO RUN UP TO THE BALL AND PICK IT UP AND THEN SAY "STOP".MEANWHILE THE OTHER PEOPLE RUN DOWN THE ROAD. THEN HE SAYS "STOP".WHEN HE'S GOT THE BALL, HE HAS TO TAKE 4 STRIDES FORWARD AND 5 LITTLE PACES FORWARD THEN HE HAS TO THROW THE BALL AT SOMEONE.IF HE MISSES THEN HE'S GOT A ROTTEN EGG. WHEN SOMEONES GOT 3 ROTTEN EGGS THEY'RE OUT
